# lmdecomp
A package for various type of linear model decomposition.

## Installation

You can install `lmdecomp` from `github` using the `devtools` package

```coffee
install.packages("devtools")
require(devtools)
install_github('xinzhou1023/lmdecomp')
```
## Example
```coffee
setwd("c:\\Users\\XinZhou\\Documents\\GitHub\\lmdecomp\\") # set work directory
library(lmdecomp) # load package
data=fread("input_data.csv") # load data
var=fread("input_var.csv") # load variable coefficients

result=decomp_log(
  input_data=data,
  input_var=var,
  y="sales", # dependent variable name in input_data
  y_m=NULL, # for ninah index process
  date="week", # date variable name in input_data
  cs=c("cs1","cs2"), # variable names for cross section in input_data; support multiple dimensions
  sm_factor=0.9, # the smoother span of LOESS. This gives the proportion of points in the plot which influence the smooth at each value. Larger values give more smoothness.
  is.output=F, # if True, then output decomp and contribution results to work directiory
  is.index=F # for ninah index process
)

runApp(result$app) # activate output panel
```
